title: Custom Skin Question
body:
Hello,

So I recently bought the _Blood Moon Aatrox_ skin, and it's very very pretty but:
I think I could make it a bit better (as in make it look a bit more like the cover image)
but I feel like modding or editing skins without asking is just asking for trouble as the entire custom skins topic isn't very well documented
(or at least I haven't seen an official post about it).
My question is:
Is modding/changing/editing/altering the skin allowed
if I have bought it and I edit it so that it doesn't copy another skin I haven't paid for.

Thanks in advance,

Neks

P.S.: @Riot good job on the skin and the recent developments :D

{{champion:266}}

replies.body:
Custom Skins are still in a bit of a grey area. You still can get banned if you use them. Here you can read more


https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications
